name: Soccer Swipe & Match 3
description:
Test your reaction and agility in this exciting soccer themed swiping and matching game, featuring four different and addictive modes. Use awesome power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous levels as you try your hardest to master the game.

FEATURES

- Super-charged match-3 puzzle game play.
- Awesome soccer themed graphics
- Four uniquely different modes; Arcade, Collector, Score Panic and Time Attack
- Explosive power ups.
- Each mode is easy to learn, yet hard to master.
- Separate leader boards for each mode and a combined board to show who's really top of the league!
- Progress is saved in every mode - try out the different modes without losing your saves.

ARCADE
Swipe and match the pieces to destroy the blue tiles on the board. The level is complete when all blue tiles have been cleared. Watch out for 'locked' and frozen pieces. Try and swipe long chains of pieces to earn bonus points and power ups. This will be key to your success in the higher levels.

COLLECTOR
Collect the required number of soccer related items to complete the level. Sounds simple, right?

SCORE PANIC
Can you reach the target score before your time runs out? The target score is increased after every level making this mode more and more challenging. Just don't panic!

TIME ATTACK
Collect a target number of soccer balls as you race against the clock, ball colour is not important, just get them! Lookout for the 'Extra Time' power up - it's really going to help you with its time stopping abilities!

GAME PLAY

Match 3 games are puzzle games. You need to match 3 or more objects by swiping pieces with your finger in any direction. Swiped pieces are removed from the board and new pieces dropped back onto the board. Matching more than 6 pieces can trigger the spawning of power ups with special abilities, helping you clear larger areas of the board.

Massive scores can be quickly achieved by swiping very large chains and you may be rewarded with a power up or special piece.
